Instance Method# apply(content:phase:)

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+

```
@MainActor @preconcurrency
func apply<V>(
    content: V,
    phase: TransitionPhase
) -> some View where V : View
```
